resources.string: Select the app which you (don\'t) want send noti.
An update exists. Do you want to update?

"Set the interval for notifications. For example, if an interval of 100ms is set and the notification 'A' appears, no other notification is sent and ignored for 100ms after the 'A' notification appears.

Option details
Entire app : Treats notifications from all apps as one app and applies intervals.
Per app : Apply notification interval for each app.


Note: This feature is not thread-safe and may cause bugs.
Due to the suppression of SMS read/send permission by Google Play policy, you need to download Noti Sender from Github rather than Play store to use this function.
